airhockeyjava.strategy

Interface IStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NaiveDefenseStrategy, NaiveOffenseStrategy, TriangleDefenseStrategy, UserInputStrategy, WaypointOffenseStrategy

    public interface IStrategy
    Interface for the strategy layer which is responsible for robot/AI decision making.
    Author:
    Joshua Segeren

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector2 getTargetPosition(float deltaTime)
      Returns the desired position for this iteration, regardless of state.
      void initStrategy()
      Initialize / reset the internal (persisted) state of the strategy component
